name: A Rock Rocket Story Through Infinite Space
name_original: A Rock Rocket Story Through Infinite Space
description:
Enjoy a travel through the extraterrestrial final frontier: the space! You will find new worlds, enjoy your adventure exploring a new horizon with every new world.

You will need to break a new puzzle on each level, and find clever ways to avoid obstacles coming your way. Be careful with your shuttle, it can get damaged really fast, and you'll have to restart from the previous checkpoint.

This is what you need to do inside this game:

- avoid or break asteroids
- avoid or break falling stars
- destroy enemy spaceships
- escape dangerous landscapes

The game will allow you to restart it only a few couple of times, after which you will have to wait until restart buttons are available again.

This vertical ascension will take you through the outside orbital adventure of a lifetime.

Enjoy the game! Compare your score with your friends, and try to beat them!
